name: Potions Class (Trijam 94)
description:
Welcome to Potions Class!

You are a little witch stuck in a Potions Class and the evil Bernadette Lestat, Potions master, wants you to create potions at a hellish pace!

How to play:

  • You need to cook potions/recipes in the cauldron. To create a potion, you need to grab two ingredients from the bottom dispensers and drop them in the cauldron, one after the other.
  • Bernadette will send you recipes on the right of the screen and you will need to create that potion before it reaches the bottom of the screen.
  • A recipe could be a mix of two colors or one unique:
    • Mix of two colors: grab the first potion (color 1) from the bottom dispenser and drop it in the cauldron. Then, do the same thing for the second potion (color 2).
    • Unique color: grab & drop the same potion two times.
  • Each time you manage to make a potion, Bernadette will increase the speed.

Controls:

MoveWASD / Arrow Keys / ZQSDGrab/Drop a potionSpace

This game has been made in 3 hours for Trijam 94 (theme: a+b=c) by two people:
